thread.title: CHA Educational Tours Announces Fall Saver Dates
thread.title_full: CHA Educational Tours Announces Fall Saver Dates

title: CHA Educational Tours Announces Fall Saver Dates
text:
SOURCE: CHA Educational Tours (Cultural Heritage Alliance) October 26, 2015 09:28 ET CHA Educational Tours Announces Fall Saver Dates 
Travelers who Book by Fall Deadlines Can Save $100 on 2016 Tours 
PHILADELPHIA, PA--(Marketwired - Oct 26, 2015) - Teachers, students and special interest groups planning international educational travel in 2016 can now take advantage of CHA's Fall Saver Dates. CHA Educational Tours has announced its registration deadlines for all 2016 tours, allowing groups to enjoy discounts on regular 2016 published tour prices. 
For winter or spring tours with departure dates through April 2016, travelers who enroll by November 1, 2015 will earn a $100 Fall Saver Discount . For summer tours, departing from May through October 2016, travelers who sign up by December 1, 2015 will take advantage of a $100 savings. 
CHA Educational Tours offers over 120 itineraries to destinations throughout Europe, Latin America, the South Pacific and Asia including three brand-new itineraries. Educational travel is a perfect opportunity to extend interests or curriculums beyond classroom settings. 
In addition to earning savings on 2016 travel for those students who enroll this fall, CHA is also looking ahead to 2017. "For the past several years we have seen an increase in inquiries from group leaders looking to plan their international travel two years in advance," says Tina Falcione, Vice President of CHA Educational Tours. "This year, for those who like to plan ahead, we will provide a preview of CHA's 2017 tour packages online in November." 
With CHA teachers who recruit six students travel free as well as qualify for other benefits including bonus points for future trips. Planning a trip online is easy. Teachers can either preselect from existing tour packages or create a fully custom tour as well as use CHA's convenient website tools such as "My Tour Quotes" and "Tour Finder" to obtain and save tour quotes, compare packages and enroll on a tour. 
About CHA Educational Tours Founded in 1969 by two foreign language teachers, CHA Educational Tours has grown to become one of the largest and most successful student group travel companies in the U.S., and is the oldest American-owned educational tour operator in existence today. Over one million teachers and students from across the U.S. and Canada have toured Europe, Latin America, Asia and the South Pacific with CHA Educational Tours. For more information, visit www.cha-tours.com or call 1-800-323-4466. Contact Information
